Misconfigurations.Title: ConfigMap with sensitive content
Misconfigurations.Description: Storing sensitive content such as usernames and email addresses in configMaps is unsafe
Misconfigurations.Message: ConfigMap 'schema-registry-kafka-controller-configuration' in '' namespace stores sensitive contents in key(s) or value(s) '{"controller.quorum.voters=0@schema-registry-kafka-controller-0.schema-registry-kafka-controller-headless..svc.cluster.local", "listener.name.controller.plain.sasl.jaas.config", "listener.name.internal.plain.sasl.jaas.config", "listener.name.internal.scram-sha-256.sasl.jaas.config", "listener.name.internal.scram-sha-512.sasl.jaas.config"}'
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Remove sensitive content from configMap data value

Misconfigurations.Title: ConfigMap with secrets
Misconfigurations.Description: Storing secrets in configMaps is unsafe
Misconfigurations.Message: ConfigMap 'schema-registry-kafka-controller-configuration' in '' namespace stores secrets in key(s) or value(s) '{"listener.name.controller.plain.sasl.jaas.config", "listener.name.internal.plain.sasl.jaas.config", "listener.name.internal.scram-sha-256.sasl.jaas.config", "listener.name.internal.scram-sha-512.sasl.jaas.config"}'
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Remove password/secret from configMap data value

Misconfigurations.Title: Runs with a root primary or supplementary GID
Misconfigurations.Description: According to pod security standard 'Non-root groups', containers should be forbidden from running with a root primary or supplementary GID.
Misconfigurations.Message: configmap schema-registry-kafka-controller-configuration in  namespace should set spec.securityContext.runAsGroup, spec.securityContext.supplementalGroups[*] and spec.securityContext.fsGroup to integer greater than 0
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Set 'containers[].securityContext.runAsGroup' to a non-zero integer or leave undefined.

Misconfigurations.Title: CPU not limited
Misconfigurations.Description: Enforcing CPU limits prevents DoS via resource exhaustion.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'kafka' of StatefulSet 'schema-registry-kafka-controller' should set 'resources.limits.cpu'

Misconfigurations.Title: CPU not limited
Misconfigurations.Description: Enforcing CPU limits prevents DoS via resource exhaustion.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'kafka-init' of StatefulSet 'schema-registry-kafka-controller' should set 'resources.limits.cpu'

Misconfigurations.Title: CPU requests not specified
Misconfigurations.Description: When containers have resource requests specified, the scheduler can make better decisions about which nodes to place pods on, and how to deal with resource contention.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'kafka' of StatefulSet 'schema-registry-kafka-controller' should set 'resources.requests.cpu'

Misconfigurations.Title: CPU requests not specified
Misconfigurations.Description: When containers have resource requests specified, the scheduler can make better decisions about which nodes to place pods on, and how to deal with resource contention.

Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'kafka-init' of StatefulSet 'schema-registry-kafka-controller' should set 'resources.limits.memory'

Misconfigurations.Title: Runs with UID <= 10000
Misconfigurations.Description: Force the container to run with user ID > 10000 to avoid conflicts with the host’s user table.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'kafka' of StatefulSet 'schema-registry-kafka-controller' should set 'securityContext.runAsUser' > 10000

Misconfigurations.Title: Runs with UID <= 10000
Misconfigurations.Description: Force the container to run with user ID > 10000 to avoid conflicts with the host’s user table.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'kafka-init' of StatefulSet 'schema-registry-kafka-controller' should set 'securityContext.runAsUser' > 10000

Misconfigurations.Title: Runs with GID <= 10000
Misconfigurations.Description: Force the container to run with group ID > 10000 to avoid conflicts with the host’s user table.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'kafka' of StatefulSet 'schema-registry-kafka-controller' should set 'securityContext.runAsGroup' > 10000

Misconfigurations.Title: Runs with GID <= 10000
Misconfigurations.Description: Force the container to run with group ID > 10000 to avoid conflicts with the host’s user table.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'kafka-init' of StatefulSet 'schema-registry-kafka-controller' should set 'securityContext.runAsGroup' > 10000

Misconfigurations.Title: Seccomp policies disabled
Misconfigurations.Description: A program inside the container can bypass Seccomp protection policies.
Misconfigurations.Message: container kafka of statefulset schema-registry-kafka-controller in  namespace should specify a seccomp profile
Misconfigurations.Resolution: Specify seccomp either by annotation or by seccomp profile type having allowed values as per pod security standards

Misconfigurations.Title: Seccomp policies disabled

Misconfigurations.Message: container kafka-init of statefulset schema-registry-kafka-controller in  namespace should specify a seccomp profile

Misconfigurations.Title: Root file system is not read-only
Misconfigurations.Description: An immutable root file system prevents applications from writing to their local disk. This can limit intrusions, as attackers will not be able to tamper with the file system or write foreign executables to disk.
Misconfigurations.Message: Container 'schema-registry' of StatefulSet 'schema-registry' should set 'securityContext.readOnlyRootFilesystem' to true
